title: 2017-05-16 - DocuSign Phishing Campaign Includes Hancitor Downloader
plain_text:

**[threatpost.com/docusign-phishing-campaign-includes-hancitor-downloader/125724/](https://threatpost.com/docusign-phishing-campaign-includes-hancitor-downloader/125724/)**

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
